thread.title_full: Costa Rican Paola Chacon crowned Miss Intercontinental TourismTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Costa Rican Paola Chacon crowned Miss Intercontinental TourismTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Costa Rican Paola Chacon crowned Miss Intercontinental Tourism
The Miss and Mister Tourism Intercontinental 2015 was held with aplomb in Dominican Republic. It was a night filled with music and lights inspired by colorful exotic birds from participating countries as the brainchild of Jamicabe Productions served as backdrop for the prestigious event.
The venue for Miss and Mister Tourism Intercontinental 2015 was Belive Hamaca Beach Resort theater.
Costa Rican Paola Chacon was crowned Miss Intercontinental Tourism while Russia´s Dina Sheptunova, won the World Tourism Queen title and Curacao´s Marvelis Hous as Mrs. Intercontinental Tourism.
Beatriz Gil of Colombia won the title of Mrs Universal World and Victor Serra of Venezuela took the Mister Intercontinental Tourism crown.
